name: DressLikeMe
author: DressLikeMe LLC

sections.description: This WordPress plugin brings the full functionality of the DressLikeMe platform directly to your blog. You can share the products of all outfits linked to dresslikeme.com with your readers in just two mouse clicks. You can also embed individual products or display your entire wardrobe.
sections.installation:
1. Upload dresslikeme directoy to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the new “DLM” admin section
  4. Enter your user credentials
  5. Use the buttons in your WordPress editor to add outfit, product or wardrobe shortcodes
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • Plugin translated into several languages
  • New layouts and styles for widgets added

1.1

  • Added recent outfits and profile badge features
  • Added new widgets for all features

1.0.1

  • Added assets

1.0

  • First version
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload dresslikeme directoy to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the new “DLM” admin section
  4. Enter your user credentials
  5. Use the buttons in your WordPress editor to add outfit, product or wardrobe shortcodes

short_description: This WordPress plugin brings the full functionality of the DressLikeMe platform directly to your blog.
description: This WordPress plugin brings the full functionality of the DressLikeMe platform directly to your blog. You can share the products of all outfits linked to dresslikeme.com with your readers in just two mouse clicks. You can also embed individual products or display your entire wardrobe.

screenshots.caption: You can store your personal access data in the plugin settings
In the WordPress editor you will find five new buttons: One of these allows you to search directly for products
After clicking on a product a short code is added to the editor
The product will appear on your blog
